snippet.title: Roarr! Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Bringing fast & furious old-fashioned approach to brawler genre, Born Lucky Games and Klabater announce ROARR! THE ADVENTURES OF RAMPAGE REX release date. The game will launch on PC and Nintendo Switch on 7th November 2018 with sharp graphics, fast combos and a lot of deadly battles and vicious enemies. Be ready… this game will make Jurassic Park look like some fairy tale for kids!

ROARR!’s fast and dynamic gameplay is a modern tribute to the good old brawler games we all enjoyed (or heard about from the older brother!) on classic Nintendo platforms. With a load of terrifying bosses, twenty five types of enemies and six completely different Isles to explore, ROARR! is a brawler heaven (or hell!) for any gamer with appetite for destruction! Not to mention that it’s a perfect game for any wild gaming party up to four players on the coach! 

*Best served on a couch in a group of 2-4 players 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦  😀

▶️ Wishlist the game on Steam: https://bit.ly/2SfkWDC
▶️ Game on Switch Store (US): https://bit.ly/2DpLZYD

More info:
FB: https://web.facebook.com/RoarrTheGame/
Klabater (publisher): https://klabater.com/
Born Lucky Games (developer): https://bit.ly/2yV4tMV
